Package Controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonListenerLyric
    shows lyrics for the song which is currently being played.
    ButtonListenerNext  
    ButtonListenerPauseAndPlay
    This class manages play and pause actions
    ButtonListenerPrevious
    click listener for previous button
    ButtonListenerRepeat  
    ButtonListenerReplay  
    ButtonListenerShufflePlay  
    ClickButtonRefreshFriendActivity
    This class contains a listener for a button that tries to connect to the client , and it refreshes the Friend Activity Area by each click
    ClickListenerForAccountManager
    click listener which closes tthe sign in or sign up frame
    ClickListenerForAddingSongs
    adds song that is chosen by file chooser to an array list in Main class if they meet certain requirements, such as being an mp3 file and etc.
    ClickListenerForGettingFriendPlaylist
    This class contains a button action listener that reads the files in the directory that is created by client and plays the songs in that directory
    ClickListenerForNewPlaylist  
    ClickListenerForPlayingTheLastSongFriendPlaylist
    This class contains a button action listener that reads the file in the directory that is created by client and plays the song in that directory
    ClickListenerForSearchButton  
    ClickListenerForShowingAlbums
    this class contains a listener for the button , and it shows the albums panel
    ClickListenerForShowingFavouritePlaylist
    this class contains a listener for the button that shows favourite playlist panel
    ClickListenerForShowingHome
    this class contains a listener for the button that shows the home panel
    ClickListenerForShowingSearchResults  
    ClickListenerForShowingSharedPlaylist
    this class contains a listener for the button that shows the shared playlist
    ClickListenerForShowingSongsList
    this class contains a listener for the button that shows the song's panel
    ClickListenerForSignInOrSignUp  
    DialogListenerAddButton
    this class contains a listener that gets a string from a static method and stores it as the playlist name in a the text file "PlaylistNames.txt"
    DialogListenerRename
    this class contains a listener that gets a string from a static method and replace it with an existing one in the text file "PlaylistNames.txt"
    FavouriteManager
    This class has two methods that manage storing the liked and disliked songs
    ItemClickedAddSongToPlaylist  
    ItemClickedRemovePlaylist
    this class contains a listener of one of the items on a menu and removes the playlist that the menu was called on it
    ItemClickedRemoveSongFromPlaylist  
    ItemClickedRenamePlaylist  
    ItemClickedShowPlaylist
    this class contains a listener of one of the items on a menu and shows the songs on the playlist that the menu was called on it
    JpotifyWindowActionListener  
    MenuClickedAddSharedPlaylist
    this class contains a listener of one of the items on a menu and adds the right clicked song to the shared playlist
    MenuClickedRemoveSharedPlaylist
    this class contains a listener of one of the items on a menu and removes the right clicked song from the shared playlist
    MouseListenerForSliders  
    PlaySpecificSongOnClick
    This class contains a listener for clicking a button and plays the song this button points to.
    QueueIndexController
    This class contains a method for controlling the song queue
    ReceivedFriendInfo  
    ScrollSliderChanger
    This class contains a listener for a scroll slider on the Music slider bar
    SelectedPlaylistListener
    This class contains a listener for the playlist names' list and it stores the name of the selected item of the list in a static string
    SelectPlayFromSearchMenu
    This class contains a lsitener for a list that plays the song item clicked on the list
    SelectSongToAddToPlaylistListener
    This class contains a listener for a list that adds the selected song item to the related playlist it was called on by adding it to the playlist's text file
    SelectSongToRemoveFromPlaylist
    This class contains a listener for a list that removes the selected song item from the related playlist it was called on by removing it from the playlist's text file
    ShowSpecificAlbumOnClick
    This class contains a listener for the buttons on the albums panel that shows the songs is each album on click
    SignInOrSignUpWindowActionListener  
    SliderThread  
    VolumeChangeListener
    This class controls the volume
